  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommentUtil
    Utility class for handling comment-related operations such as retrieving, updating, and checking the completion status of comments for shuttles.
    GeneralTaskUtil
    Utility class for handling general task-related operations for shuttles.
    MechanicUtil
    Utility class for handling mechanic-related operations such as retrieving all mechanics or a specific mechanic by ID.
    NotificationUtil
    Utility class for handling notification-related operations.
    PartUtil
    Utility class for handling part-related operations such as retrieving, using, and ordering parts for shuttles.
    QuestionnaireUtil
    Utility class for handling questionnaire-related operations.
    ShuttleUtil
    Utility class for handling shuttle-related operations.
    TableSearchHelper<T>
    A helper class for adding search functionality to a JavaFX TableView.
    TaskUtil
    Utility class for handling task-related operations for shuttles.
    Util
    Utility class providing helper methods for various UI-related operations.
